message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. This is a great deal as it's worth significantly more to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $9000 is still below my minimum.  I'm willing to come down to $9500.  This is a fair price considering the value to you. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $9200?
